page.title: 07HOBBIES
page.content: My hobby is roller skating.People often start with these,which are four small wheels fitted to a metal plate,attached to your foot.Roller boots are boots which you put put on yourfeet which have the wheels on them.Each boot has four wheels on it and a rubber stopper on the front.When you have done up the laces you go outside in them and skate around using your arms to keep your balance when you spin and turn corners.These boots are known as roller boots and are common with children in many countries. By Laura Elliot.
